WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
when I open the project and hit F5 the only thing I get is a page with a site name and home and about. I don't get a post that is described in http://neimke.spaces.live.com/blog/cns!F964EB605E70A5CA!513.entry
I am not sure what I have to do. I've checked and the thing is that the post actually gets selected but it seems that the wrong view is rendered or something.
And when you uncomment the code in Global.asax you get an error.

Comments.Message: We're releasing a new version of Oxite tomorrow so it might be worth trying that (it runs a newer version of ASP.NET MVC).  In the meantime, please start a discussion when you have general "not working" problems and we and others can try to help you.  Thanks!
